statement.p: In 38.24 of the last 34 days it rained. How many days did it not rain? days

solution.p: We recall that a percent as a decimal is part/whole. Here that is \displaystyle\frac{{P}}{{34}}={0.3824}. We solve for P by multiplying by \displaystyle{34}. \displaystyle{P}={0.3824}\cdot{34}={13.0016}. This is the number of days that it rained. We want the non-rainy days which is 34-13.0016=20.9984 We round that as requested to 21.
